name: Career Development
description: Service include, additional paid internships, training workshops, career exploration panels, scholarships, and leadership development.
fullDescription: Service include, additional paid internships, training workshops, career exploration panels, scholarships, and leadership development.
whatTheyOffer: Service include, additional paid internships, training workshops, career exploration panels, scholarships, and leadership development.
howToGetIt: Apply for Career Development opportunities using links on the Enterprise for Youth Career Development website: https://www.enterpriseforyouth.org/career-development
